articles.author: Tom Victor
articles.title: Gianluca Scamacca sends West Ham message Declan Rice was demanding to hear - The Mirror
articles.description: West Ham United have spent big to sign Gianluca Scamacca from Sassuolo, building on a squad which will be involved in European competition for a second straight season
articles.content:
Eighteen months after letting Sebastien Haller leave the London Stadium, West Ham United have found a replacement for the Ivorian. 
 Gianluca Scamacca has joined the Hammers from Sassuolo, with the … [+4039 chars]

articles.author: 9News Staff
articles.title: Putin using critical gas pipeline as 'weapon', sending Europe into panic - 9News
articles.description: Vladimir Putin and the Kremlin are preparing to hit the West where it hurts, by turning off a vital gas pipeline to Europe so it provides a mere trickle of its capacity.

articles.author: Natasha Bertrand, CNN
articles.title: US officials say 'biggest fear' has come true as Russia cuts gas supplies to Europe - CNN
articles.description: The Biden administration is working furiously behind the scenes to keep European allies united against Russia as Moscow further cuts its energy supplies to the European Union, prompting panic on both sides of the Atlantic over potentially severe gas shortages…

articles.title: European Union strikes deal to ration natural gas amid Russia cut-off fears - CBC News
articles.description: EU energy ministers approved a draft European law meant to lower demand for gas by 15 per cent from August through March.
articles.content:
European Union governments agreed Tuesday to ration natural gas this winter to protect themselves against any further supply cuts by Russia as Moscow pursues its invasion of Ukraine.
